message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll be interested in. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I can't afford $9000 for this product. I am willing to pay up to $7500 for it.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. I can meet you in the middle at $8500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I am willing to pay $8000 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
